DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct Europe . The aim study extract data French National Registry hold information patient initiated growth hormone therapy objective describe patient receive growth hormone therapy , assess efficacy safety somatropin ( Norditropin® SimpleXx® ) evaluate treatment compliance .
